description: Canonical definition of an assessment including title, subject, grade band, and scoring method.
businessMeaning: Provides the authoritative metadata for assessments used across districts. Enables consistent reporting and item alignment.
content: Zipline Assessment Definition element specifying title, subject, grade band, and scoring method. Used as a reference for all results and item alignments. Domain: Student Assessment.

description: Student-level assessment results capturing raw scores, scaled scores, and performance levels.
businessMeaning: Primary facts for performance analysis, accountability reporting, and instructional planning.
content: Zipline dataset of student assessment results including raw and scaled scores with performance levels for accountability and planning. Domain: Student Assessment.

description: Numeric score reported for an assessment attempt.
businessMeaning: Ambiguous label 'Score' clarified: represents the calculated numeric outcome for a test attempt used by performance analytics.
content: Assessment Results column 'Score' representing the numeric outcome for a test attempt. Data type INTEGER. Source table: ASSESS_RESULTS. Domain: Student Assessment.

businessMeaning: Categorical proficiency level (e.g., Did Not Meet, Approaches, Meets, Masters) derived from scaled score ranges.
content: Performance Level element providing categorical proficiency derived from scaled score ranges and aligned to district/state definitions. Domain: Student Assessment.

description: Scheduled date ranges for assessment administration by campus and grade.
businessMeaning: Supports logistics and compliance by defining valid administration windows and blackout periods.
content: Test Window dataset defining scheduled administration ranges and blackout periods per campus and grade. Domain: Student Assessment.

description: Repository of assessment items with standards alignment and difficulty parameters.
businessMeaning: Central store for instructional and assessment items reused across multiple tests and systems.
content: Item Bank table with alignment to standards and difficulty parameters, enabling item reuse across tests and platforms. Domain: Student Assessment.

description: Scale identifier indicating the scoring scale applied (e.g., 0-100, 2000 series).
businessMeaning: Clarifies which scoring scale governs interpretation of scores for comparability across administrations.
content: Assessment Results column 'Scale' identifying the scoring scale applied to scores for comparability across administrations. Data type VARCHAR(20). Source: ASSESS_RESULTS.

description: Accommodation recorded for a student's assessment attempt (e.g., extended time, read aloud).
businessMeaning: Supports accessibility and compliance tracking across assessment administrations.
content: Student Accommodation element capturing accommodations such as extended time or read aloud for an assessment attempt. Domain: Student Assessment.
